sentences.en: A canny investor would need to predict when the dollar will once more start tumbling.
sentences.cn: 精明的投资者需要预计到美元何时会再次大跌。

sentences.en: A very good investor will outguess the market.
sentences.cn: 精明的投资者能准确预测市场。

sentences.en: An unfavorable depreciation allowance may keep the foreign investor out.
sentences.cn: 不利的折旧率也会将外国投资者拒之门外.

sentences.en: Ask the investor to check the correctness of what he has written.
sentences.cn: 让投资人检查一下他所写的是否正确。

sentences.en: If the owner cannot produce cash, some of the stock is sold at the investor's loss.
sentences.cn: 如果他拿不出现金, 就得卖掉部分股票,损失由投资者承担.

sentences.en: My nephew is a cautious investor.
sentences.cn: 我侄子是个小心谨慎的投资者.

sentences.en: On option market the gain of butterfly spread investor is random.
sentences.cn: 期权市场蝶状价差的投资者获益具有随机性.

sentences.en: Somebody who is a foreign investor and more sensitive about the public profile will be more impacted by that pressure.
sentences.cn: 对公众形象较注意的外国投资者会更多地受到那种压力的影响。

sentences.en: That means an investor rush to redeem the bonds could delay payment.
sentences.cn: 这意味着一位投资者急于兑现可能会导致付款推迟.

sentences.en: The aim of the service was to offer everything the independent investor wanted, bar advice.
sentences.cn: 该项服务的目的就是向独立投资者提供除建议外他们想要的一切。

sentences.en: The investment banker is the middleman between company and investor.
sentences.cn: 投资银行的主要功能就是为公司销售长期证券.

sentences.en: The investor believes that his investment will pay off handsomely soon.
sentences.cn: 这个投资者相信他的投资不久会有相当大的收益.

sentences.en: The investor can consider the broker's or experts'advice and recommendations.
sentences.cn: 投资者可以考虑一下股票经纪人或专家们的建议和推介.

sentences.en: The investor has substantial control over the foreign subsidiary enterprise.
sentences.cn: 投资者对于国外子公司具有实际的控制权.

sentences.en: The main investor in the project is the French bank Credit National.
sentences.cn: 该项目的主要投资商是法国的国民信贷银行。

投资者关系；投资者关系部；股东关系

trans.tran_cn: 投资者，出资者，包围者，围攻者
trans.tran_en: someone who gives money to a company, business, or bank in order to get a profit
